title: Sexual Escapade: Married Woman Mating at Night
overview: Yuki, the wife of a university professor, was suffering from sexual violence from her husband. Yoriko, a female counselor at the domestic violence counseling office, is attracted to Yuki and invites her to escape to Izu. Yoriko, who is entrusted with the management of the drive-in, works hard to open the drive-in while being in love with her girlfriend, Yuki. Two men appear there...
